business.headline: India slashes import duty on bourbon whisky to 100% after Trump's criticismThe reduction in customs duty on bourbon whisky was notified on February 13 just ahead of Prime Minister Narendra Modi's talks with US President Donald Trump.
What is digital lending? 5 key benefits you should know Digital lending platforms make use of advanced technology, thereby making the loan process faster, simpler and more efficient.

New Income Tax bill: Has it really been simplified for taxpayers?The proposed income tax bill seeks to simplify and revamp the Income Tax Act of 1961, which has often been criticised for its complexity, making it challenging for ordinary taxpayers to navigate.
New UPI transaction rule: All you need to know about auto chargeback processThe changes are primarily regarding auto acceptance and rejection of chargebacks, thereby making the system more efficient.
Sensex, Nifty end lower as FIIs continue to exit Dalal StreetThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 199.76 points to end at 75,939.21, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 102.15 points to close at 22,929.25.

Explained: Why Vodafone Idea share price tumbled nearly 6%VI shares were down 5.09% to Rs 8.22 at around 3:15 pm. Earlier during the trading session, shares of the telecom operator fell as much as 6%.

Ambani family richest in Asia. Check which Indian families made the top 20The Ambani family tops Bloomberg's list of Asia's 20 richest families. The family's flagship company, Reliance Industries, is presently headed by Mukesh Ambani, son of late industrialist Dhirubhai Ambani.

RBI curbs on New India Co-operative Bank: How does it impact customers?New India Co-operative Bank has been struggling with financial losses in recent years. According to its annual report, the bank recorded a loss of Rs 22.78 crore in the financial year ending March 2024, following a loss of Rs 30.75 crore in the previous year.

New India Co-operative Bank's financial operations halted after notice from RBIThe Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has restricted Mumbai-based New India Co-operative Bank from issuing loans, accepting deposits, or permitting withdrawals for six months. The move comes amid concerns over the bank's financial health and liquidity.

Not Trump's tariffs, but this is what's making stock market investors anxiousThe stock market jitters have occurred despite government measures, including tax relief and the Reserve Bank of India's (RBI) decision to reduce the repo rate by 25 basis points.

RBI issues notice to halt all financial operations of New India Co-operative BankRBI's move comes after what it called 'recent material developments' at the bank. Although the central bank did not provide specific details, it stated that these directions were issued to protect depositors' interests.

New income tax bill: All you questions answeredThe new income tax bill, compared to the Income Tax Act, 1961, is nearly half the size, containing 259,676 words, 23 chapters, 536 sections, 57 tables and 46 formulae.

entertainment.headline: South Korean actor Kim Sae-ron, 24, found deadSouth Korean actor Kim Sae-ron, known for her roles in Bloodhounds and The Man from Nowhere, was found dead at her home in Seoul. She was 24. Authorities are investigating the circumstances of her death, with no signs of foul play reported yet.

The White Lotus S3 review: Predictable? Yes. Addictive? Also, yesReleased-Mon Feb 17, 2025The White Lotus Season 3 review: The White Lotus returns with a new season set in Thailand, offering a fresh cultural backdrop while retaining its biting satire on the ultra-rich. The series continues to entertain with its dark humour and ensemble cast, though its formula is starting to feel familiar. Read our full review.

Kanye West says he fought 5 hours for Grammy tickets amid guest list confusionRapper Kanye West, in a post on X, revealed that he fought for five hours to secure Grammy tickets amid guest list chaos. This comes amid claims that Kanye arrived at the event uninvited.

Comedian Anubhav Bassi's Lucknow show cancelled after warning over foul languageThe shows of comedian Anubhav Singh Bassi in Lucknow were cancelled due to concerns over inappropriate content, following a complaint by the UP Women's Commission vice-chairperson. Authorities cited potential law and order issues as reasons for the cancellation.

Watch: Chum Darang blushes as Karan Veer confesses love on Valentine's DayKaran Veer Mehra confessed his love for Chum Darang on Valentine's Day. Chum shared a post from their romantic outing on social media.
Watch: Ed Sheeran pauses Delhi concert as fan faints, wears Team India jerseyEd Sheeran wrapped up his India tour in Gurugram on February 15. He paused his concert briefly to help a fan who fainted.

Shalin Bhanot reacts to India's Got Latent Row, advocates self-disciplineTV actor Shalin Bhanot has reacted to the controversy surrounding YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia's comment on India's Got Latent during the FDCI's India Men's Weekend in Jaipur. He emphasised self-discipline and responsibility.

Today is a victory: Jay-Z reacts after rape lawsuit against him droppedIn a significant legal victory, rapper Jay-Z has seen a sexual assault lawsuit against him dismissed. The rapper and entrepreneur expressed relief and satisfaction over the court's decision.

No one can save him: Mahabharat actor threatens Ranveer Allahbadia Actor Saurav Gurjar openly threatened Ranveer Allahbadia over his recent remarks on India's Got Latent. In a video message, the actor requested the government to take strict action against the podcaster.

Drake releases new album amid feud with Kendrick Lamar, fails to impress fansDrake appears to have ended his feud with Kendrick Lamar in his latest album, but fans remain unimpressed. Released on Valentine's Day, the album in collaboration with PartyNextDoor marks his first new work since the Super Bowl halftime show.

Bharti Singh supports Samay Raina amid India's Got Latent controversyComedian Bharti Singh supported Samay Raina amid the India's Got Latent controversy. The comedian praised Samay and said that he is very sweet, and anyone can become his fan once they get to meet him.

Women's panel summons Elvish Yadav over remarks against Chum Darang on Feb 17YouTuber Elvish Yadav has been summoned by a women's panel following his racist remarks against Chum Darang. Yadav criticised her name and nationality, sparking courage among northeastern citizens.

Apoorva Mukhija aka Rebel Kid removed from official IIFA ambassador listApoorva Mukhija, known as Rebel Kid, has been removed from the IIFA ambassador list following controversy over her appearance in Samay Raina's show, India's Got Latent. The decision follows threats from Karni Sena to disrupt her upcoming shoot.

Fighting zombies to playing a psychopath: The many faces of Choi Woo-shikLong before Choi Woo-shik became a household name thanks to Parasite, he had already amassed an impressive filmography. On this week's K-Fix, we'll have a closer look at his notable works, crafted long before his Oscar-winning turn in Parasite.

The Potato Lab trailer: Kang Tae-oh is set to headline upcoming rom-comThe trailer for The Potato Lab, a romantic comedy-drama starring Kang Tae-oh and Lee Sun-bin, has been released. The series, set in a rural potato research institute, promises a blend of romance, comedy, and workplace drama.

Dhoom Dhaam review: Romance meets thrill in this Yami Gautam-Pratik Gandhi filmReleased-Fri Feb 14, 2025Dhoom Dhaam movie review: Dhoom Dhaam blends romance with action and comedy, offering a refreshing alternative to traditional Valentine's Day films. Starring Yami Gautam and Pratik Gandhi, the movie delivers a thrilling and entertaining experience perfect for a cosy night in.

Scared of Loving You: Selena Gomez's new song for her Valentine Benny Blanco out Lovebirds Selena Gomez and Benny Blanco have now collaborated for a new album titled I Said I Love You First. On the occasion of Valentine's Day 2025, Selena released the first single from the album, Scared of Loving You.

Ilaiyaraaja appears in Court in dispute with music company over his compositionsIn 2010, Music Master filed a lawsuit seeking a ban on the use of these songs on YouTube and social media platforms, calling it "unauthorised".

Are K-Drama men written by women too good to be true? | Valentine Special K-drama male leads have captivated audiences with their idealised traits, offering a romantic fantasy of the perfect partner. These characters, crafted by female screenwriters, challenge traditional portrayals. This Valentine's Day we analyse if they are too good to be true.
Prime Video's Rings of Power renewed for third seasonPrime Video's Rings of Power has been renewed for the third installment, the makers announced recently. Its second season was released last year.

Mrs director Arati Kadav on backlash over missing credits: Glad it was called outDirector Arati Kadav addresses the backlash over Mrs not crediting The Great Indian Kitchen in the trailer, stressing the need for proper recognition. Mrs, starring Sanya Malhotra, is streaming on Zee5.

Viral video: Kanan Gill made same remark as Ranveer Allahbadia years agoAs Ranveer Allahbadia faces backlash for his India's Got Latent remark, an old video of Kanan Gill asking the same question resurfaces on the internet.

Kanye West, Bianca Censori heading for divorce? Team clarifiesIt was previously reported that singer-rapper Kanye West and his wife, Bianca Censori, had split and were headed for divorce. However, a recent development has refuted these claims, labelling them as "tabloid rumours."

Sanya Malhotra's Mrs. makes questions on marital rape, mechanical sex personalImagine a woman bleeding for five days in a month, and those five days being the most peaceful in her life because she can finally refuse sex to her husband. He can't assert his power over her. That's how Sanya Malhotra's 'Mrs.' unsettles you and makes you think.

Singer-composer Vishal Dadlani meets with an accident, undergoes treatmentVishal Dadlani of the Vishal-Sheykhar duo is undergoing treatment after an accident, leading to the postponement of their upcoming concert scheduled for March 2.

Not just Gujarat, all Samay Raina shows cancelled amid India's Got Latent rowSamay Raina's shows in India have been cancelled following controversy around India's Got Latent, with Gujarat shows being the first to be affected.

Singer Jonita Gandhi to perform at Lollapalooza India, will open for Shawn MendesJonita Gandhi will perform at Lollapalooza India on March 8, opening for Shawn Mendes. Her latest single Channa has also been nominated for a Juno Award.

Twilight star Taylor Lautner to return as werewolf in self-aware werewolf seriesTwilight star Taylor Lautner is returning to portray a werewolf in the self-aware Amazon series. Details of the show are yet to be revealed.

Anupamaa actor Rupali Ganguly seeks blessings at Maha KumbhActor Rupali Ganguly visited Maha Kumbh in Prayagraj with her family. She shared moments from her spiritual visit, including performing aarti, attending a hawan, and meeting a saint.

Nawazuddin Siddiqui begins Raat Akeli Hai 2 shooting in LucknowActor Nawazuddin Siddiqui has begun Raat Akeli Hai 2 shooting in Lucknow. The actor will be seen sharing screen space with Chitragandha Singh.

Olivia Swann on NCIS: Sydney, her character's growth & challenges In this exclusive interview with India Today's Bhavna Agarwal, Olivia Swann dives deep into her role in NCIS: Sydney, sharing insights into her character's journey, development, and challenges throughout the series.

Rozlyn Khan sues Ankita Lokhande for defamation over 'cheap' remark TV actor Rozlyn Khan took legal action against Ankita Lokhande's recent comments. Ankita had called her 'cheap', for her claims about Hina Khan's cancer battle.

Jackson Wang makes a powerful comeback with High Alone from Magic Man 2Jackson Wang drops a new single, High Alone, that marks the beginning of his new album, MAGIC MAN 2. The album promises a deep dive into themes of identity and personal transformation, set against a backdrop of atmospheric production and introspective lyrics.

Actor John Lithgow approached to play Albus Dumbledore in Harry Potter seriesAward-winning American actor John Lithgow has reportedly been approached to play the iconic character of Hogwarts principal Albus Dumbledore in HBO's Harry Potter series.

Rupali Ganguly's stepdaughter calls her 'evil step lady', issues clarificationRupali Ganguly's stepdaughter, Esha Verma, clarified her viral social media post against the actor. Esha requested privacy.

Truth behind viral video of Ranveer Allahbadia crying over 'loss of work'Amid backlash over India's Got Latent, an old video of Ranveer Allahbadia crying resurfaces. In the video, the podcaster is seen breaking down over 'loss of work'.

Jonas Brothers hint at big change for 2025, shocked fans ask, 'another breakup?'The Jonas Brothers shared a letter on social media that briefly sent fans into a panic. In it, they hinted at their 2025 lineup and expressed gratitude to their fans for supporting them throughout their musical journey.

Kapil Sharma's 'Maa Baap ki Kabaddi' joke goes viral amid Ranveer Allahbadia rowAmid the controversy over Ranveer Allahbadia's comment on Samay Raina's show India's Got Latent, an old clip of Kapil Sharma joking about kids watching "maa baap ki kabaddi" is going viral.

Watch: Did AR Rahman refer to Ranveer Allahbadia row at Chhaava music launch?AR Rahman made a humorous remark at the Chhaava music launch that has led to speculation about its connection to the recent controversy involving Ranveer Allahbadia and Samay Raina.

Ed Sheeran's India dump features photo from football match with John AbrahamSinger Ed Sheeran shared his India dump, which also featured a glimpse of his football match with Bollywood actor John Abraham. Sheeran is in India for his Mathematics Tour.

general news.headline: US flight carrying third batch of 112 Indian deportees lands in AmritsarA US Air Force C-17 Globemaster landed in Amritsar, carrying 112 Indians deported from the US for illegal residency. This marks the third such arrival in 10 days amid US immigration crackdowns.

Man trying to exit station due to overcrowding lost 7-year-old in Delhi stampedeSeven-year-old Riya was among the 18 people killed in the stampede at New Delhi Railway Station on Saturday. She was trying to leave the station with her parents after they decided to call off their journey due to the rush.

Delhi Chief Minister oath likely on February 18: SourcesThe BJP is set to finalise its Chief Minister soon, with several contenders, including Parvesh Verma, Vijender Gupta, and potential women candidates, under consideration.

IPL schedule: KKR vs RCB in opener on March 22, final in Kolkata on May 25IPL 2025: The BCCI announced the full schedule for the new season. KKR will take on RCB in the opening match on March 22 while the final will be in Kolkata on May 25. A total of 13 venues to host 74 matches in the 2025 season.

The state of the mob and the failure of the stateAt the New Delhi railway station on Saturday night, a "sea of humanity" travelling for a Kumbh dip was waiting for the train to Prayagraj. A platform-change announcement triggered a tsunami in that sea. Faith, fate, and a whole lot of frantic feet. India has a mob problem.

Women, children not restrained on 2nd US flight that landed in Amritsar: SourcesA plane carrying 116 Indian deportees from the US landed in Amritsar. This is the second such deportation under US immigration policies. The flight followed a meeting between Prime Minister Modi and President Trump in Washington.

Yamuna clean-up begins under Lt Governor's order week after BJP win in DelhiDelhi Lieutenant Governor VK Saxena has launched Yamuna River clean-up efforts, deploying machinery and enforcing oversight, despite the absence of a new state government.

WPL 2025: Priya Mishra, Gardner guide Gujarat to 1st win of season vs UP WarriorzGujarat Giants registered their first win of the season as they beat UP Warriorz in the third match of the Women's Premier League 2025. Ashleigh Gardner was once again top scorer for Gujarat.

Our sanskari swear words, profanity paramparaFrom abuses in Gaari Geet and Holi meetings, to profanities hurled at the deity at a temple fest in Kerala and expletives being used as conjunctions in everyday life, Indians need no primer on bawdy jokes and cuss words. And that's culture too. A look at that culture even as Indians outrage over Ranveer Allahbadia and Samay Raina.

Beyond Budget 2025: Not cities, create 50 circuits of developed tourismThe goal, industry experts say, should be to offer tourist packages because travellers, unlike local day-trippers, don't visit just one location

11-year-old, grandparents on way to Kumbh among those killed in Delhi stampedeVijay Saha and Krishna Devi were on their way to Prayagraj along with granddaughter Suruchi. However, all three of them were killed in the deadly stampede in New Delhi.

Spoke in national interest: Shashi Tharoor on why he praised PM Modi's US visitA video of Shahi Tharoor's rare praise of Prime Minister Narendra Modi for his US visit and meeting with Donald Trump went viral on social media, with many BJP supporters appreciating his remarks.

Chhaava: Audience in tears after watching Vicky Kaushal's period drama. WatchVicky Kaushal's period drama, Chhaava, has earned appreciation from all quarters. A video of fans getting emotional after watching the film has emerged online.

Delhi cops say similar train names caused confusion, led to deadly stampedeThe Delhi Police said that two trains - Prayagraj Express and Prayagraj Special, and the announcement of the latter arriving at platform 16 caused confusion. This is because Prayagraj Express was already standing on platform 14.

CSK vs MI double returns after a year, no Hardik Pandya in 1st matchIPL 2025: Chennai Super Kings and Mumbai Indians will face twice in the IPL season for the first time since 2023. Hardik Pandya, Mumbai Indians' captain, will miss their first meeting in Chennai on March 23.

Legs chained, hands cuffed: Indian deportee on 2nd US flight recounts ordealThe US military C-17 aircraft, that landed in Amritsar late Saturday night, carried the second batch of illegal Indian immigrants as part of President Donald Trump's massive crackdown against undocumented aliens in America.

Pakistani man dances to Nimbooda Nimbooda in viral video. Internet loves his graceA video of a Pakistani man dancing effortlessly to Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's hit song 'Nimbooda Nimbooda' has gone viral on social media.

Elon Musk's DOGE cancels $21 million US funding for voter turnout in IndiaElon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) has announced a decision to cut $723 million in foreign aid funding as part of its broader budget overhaul plans.

Delhi Lt Governor's edited tweet on stampede sparks row, AAP alleges cover-upDelhi Lt Governor VK Saxena faced political backlash after editing his tweet on the New Delhi Railway Station stampede to remove the mention of deaths. The AAP accused him of downplaying the tragedy, which left 18 dead.

Groom seeks Thar in dowry day before wedding, skips event over unmet demandA groom in Bhopal and his family have been charged under the Dowry Prohibition Act after he allegedly demanded a Thar jeep, cash, and jewellery before the wedding and called off the marriage when the bride's family refused the demands.

'Faaltu hai Kumbh': Lalu Yadav's remark on Delhi stampede sparks rowLalu Prasad Yadav called the Maha Kumbh meaningless while commenting on the stampede at Delhi Railway Station. The BJP targeted him over the remarks, accusing him of insulting Sanatana Dharma and playing politics over dead bodies.

South Korean actor Kim Sae-ron, 24, found deadSouth Korean actor Kim Sae-ron, known for her roles in Bloodhounds and The Man from Nowhere, was found dead at her home in Seoul. She was 24. Authorities are investigating the circumstances of her death, with no signs of foul play reported yet.

Pushpa actor Daali Dhananjaya marries Dhanyatha Gauraklar, first pics outKannada actor Daali Dhananjaya got married to Dr Dhanyatha Gauraklar in a close-knit ceremony, attended by friends and family. The first pictures from their wedding are finally out.

Abhishek Bachchan poses for a pic with Amy Jackson-Ed Westwick at British galaActor Abhishek Bachchan, who was among the other stars at At British Asian Trust Gala, posed for a picture with Amy Jackson and Ed Westwick.

Watch: Raha's reaction to magician's trick at Jeh's party reminds fans of Rishi KapoorRanbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt's daughter, Raha's adorable reaction to a magician's trick at Kareena Kapoor's son Jeh's birthday bash has gone viral.  Her reaction reminded the internet of Rishi Kapoor.

sports.headline: Champions Trophy 2025: India to play on fresh pitches in Dubai The Indian cricket team is set to play their matches of the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 on two fresh pitches in Dubai specially kept aside for the tournament.

WPL 2025: Priya Mishra, Gardner guide Gujarat to 1st win of season vs UP WarriorzGujarat Giants registered their first win of the season as they beat UP Warriorz in the third match of the Women's Premier League 2025. Ashleigh Gardner was once again top scorer for Gujarat.

Carlos Alcaraz reacts to Jannik Sinner's doping settlement, eyes No. 1 spotWhile Jannik Sinner's agreement with the World Anti-Doping Agency for a reduced doping ban has created a stir in the tennis community, Carlos Alcaraz seemed uninterested in the debate surrounding his arch-rival.

Shami's workout, Pant's injury scare: India's 1st training highlights in DubaiThe Indian cricket team took part in their first practice session after landing in Dubai for the Champions Trophy 2025 as Mohammed Shami was seen working along with bowling coach Morne Morkel. Rishabh Pant was hit by a shot from Hardik Pandya but recovered quickly after being attended by the team's physio.

Sure MS Dhoni will overtake me in T20s, not fascinated by records: Dinesh KarthikDinesh Karthik recently surpassed MS Dhoni on the list of batters with the most runs in T20s. The wicketkeeper-batter reflected on his memorable SA20 stint, describing his experience of rubbing shoulders with Joe Root at Paarl Royals as fantastic.

IPL 2025 team-wise full schedule: Key matches of CSK, MI, RCB, KKR and othersThe schedule for the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) was unveiled by the BCCI (Board of Control for Cricket in India) on Sunday, February 16. Here's the team-wise schedule of all the IPL teams such as CSK, MI, RCB and KKR amongst others.

IPL 2025 schedule announced: 13 venues, 12 double-headers in new seasonA total of 13 venues will be used for the new season of the IPL in 2025 as the tournament starts on March 22. The 2025 season will see 12 double headers take place as the 10 teams battle it out for the title.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
